name: Avoid classes having too many parents (PHP)
description: This rule searches for all the classes with too many parents.
output:
"This report lists all the classes with too many parents.

This QR provides the following information:
Class full name."
rationale: A class with many parents is an indicator of an unbalanced and incorrect class hierarchy. A refactoring of this class hierarchy should be considered.
remediation: Review the architecture of the application to reduce the number of parents of the class.
